overview: In the original scriptwriter of director Yori Kojun who is also active as a stage director, actress Misaki Morino who again showed acting per body with Yorikojun’s directed sensual movie “Flower Bird Basket” served as a starter again. Atashira  is a work that depicts himself, a person who can not be controlled by himself, a human being suffering from genes. In a complicated and tricky drama centered on A child, I will draw various human patterns, sexuality, life, death...
tagline: Who are you? Shiranai Lonely genius  You know who you are?
title: Atashira
